I filmed one class, but you can‚Äôt actually see the objects because of the camera placement! Oops! Now I know!

If you don‚Äôt have plans for Monday it might be a great idea to teach about el ti√≥ and introduce your very own one for class‚Ä¶ I plan to have it ‚Äúpoop‚Äù over break, leaving each student a little ‚Äútreat‚Äù‚Ä¶ ¬°Qu√© asco! ¬°Qu√© delicioso! wait‚Ä¶ what!??!!
